altTitles.ja: 君の名は。

description.en:
The story is set one month after a comet has fallen for the first time in a thousand years in Japan. Mitsuha, a high school girl living in the countryside, wants to live in the city because she is tired of life in the country. Then, there's Taki. He's a high school student living in Tokyo with his friends while working as a part-timer at an Italian restaurant. He also has a strong interest in fine arts involving architecture. One day, Mitsuha dreams of herself as a young man. On the other hand, Taki also has a dream where he is a female student attending high school in the countryside. What's the secret behind their dreams?

---
**Links:**  
 [Official English: Your name. (Bookwalker)](https://global.bookwalker.jp/series/116499/)  
[Your name. Another Side：Earthbound　01 (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/de5eda5c87-df5f-455d-8502-01e66e2c37fb/)
description.pt-br: A história começa um mês depois de um cometa ter caído pela primeira vez em mil anos no Japão. Mitsuha, uma garota do ensino médio que mora no interior, quer morar na cidade porque está cansada da vida no campo. Então, há o Taki. Ele é um estudante do ensino médio que mora em Tóquio com seus amigos enquanto trabalhava meio período em um restaurante italiano. Ele também tem um forte interesse em artes plásticas envolvendo arquitetura. Um dia, Mitsuha tem um sonho em que é um menino. Por outro lado, Taki também tem um sonho em que ele é uma aluna freqüentando o ensino médio no interior. Qual o segredo por trás dos sonhos deles?

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: Mofutte ii no wa Omae dake

altTitles.ja: モフっていいのはお前だけ

description.en: Determined to defeat all canines, Shiro is a cute little white cat with a selfish attitude who’s unwillingly picked up off the streets by Kuro’s owner. Kuro is the large black dog who vows to protect Shiro, but one day after the two are all grown up, Shiro suddenly goes into heat!

altTitles.ja: S・L・H ~ストレイ・ラブ・ハーツ~
S・L・H ストレイ・ラブ・ハーツ!

description.en: On the eve of her sixteenth birthday, Kozue Hiyoki is visited in her dreams by a man who steals her heart- literally! Determined to find him and retrieve her stolen heart, Hiyoki, with the color of the man's hair and the tattoo on his chest as her only leads, enrolls in the S-Hall dormitories of St. Nazareth Academy, but quickly realizes that its residents are not at all like she expected… For starters, they're all guys! There, Hiyoki soon discovers that she has the ability to look inside her dorm-mates' dreams, which may be the key to uncovering the identity of the thief who stole her heart…. But perhaps her biggest challenge is that most of the guys won't let Hiyoki into their rooms, much less their hearts!

title.en: Aru Hi Totsuzen, Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.ja-ro: ある日、突然ギャルの許嫁ができた
Aru hi Totsuzen, Gyaru no Iinazuke ga Dekita

altTitles.en: One Day, I Suddenly Got Myself a Gal Fiancée​
One Day, Out of the Blue, I Got a Gal's Forgiving Wife

description.en:
"Hey, hey, why are you always pretending to be asleep?"

Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancee!?

A school romantic comedy between two polar opposites, Yin and Yang, has begun!

altTitles.pt-br: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco – Next Dimension: A Saga de Hades

altTitles.ja-ro: Saint Seiya - Next Dimension - Meiō Shinwa

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢 NEXT DIMENSION 冥王神話

description.en: Saint Seiya: Next Dimension - The Myth of Hades, also known as simply Next Dimension, is an ongoing manga written and illustrated by Masami Kurumada. It is a prequel and continuation to his manga series Saint Seiya; placed during the previous "Holy War" between the deities Hades and Athena and their respective minions, the Specters and the Saints, during the 18th century in the franchise's fictional chronology. It is published by Akita Shoten in the weekly magazine Weekly Shōnen Champion at irregular dates. It is also known by its alternate subtitle Galaxy Myth (銀河神話 Ginga Shinwa?), which is used during publication to refer to the segments of the storyline set in the 20th century, as opposed to the Myth of Hades subtitle, which refers to the segments set in the 18th century.
description.pt-br: Continuação direta de Saint Seiya (Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco). Em 1990, em Elysium, os cinco Saint's (Cavaleiros), Seiya, Hyoga, Shun, Shiryu e Ikki estão lutando contra o deus Hades. Durante a batalha, Hades começa lembrando que ele tenha visto o rosto de Seiya antes e chega à conclusão de que ele enfrentou antes, e assim começa a história... Athena para tentar ajudar Seiya que foi ferido nessa batalha pela espada sagrada de Hades, volta para o passado com a ajuda de Crhonos o Titã do Tempo, para tentar destruir a espada mas as coisas não saem bem como ela queria...

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.ja: アップルパルフェ おねロリ百合アンソロジー

description.en:
The relationship between "girls" and "women".
A completely new yuri anthology of "onee-and-loli" stories, all by different authors.

Cover: Kawaku

**Chapters**:
1. **Mashiro-chan's future lover** (Mashiro-chan no Mirai no Koibito, ましろちゃんの未来の恋人) by Itou Hachi
2. **Midnight funeral Where I can't let it be found** (Zettai ni Bare te wa Ikenai Soushiki 24-ji, 絶対にバレてはいけない葬式２４時) by Canno
3. **Scent and reflection** (Kaori to Kaze, 香りと影) by Terayama Den
4. **The Place Where We Belong** (Futari no Ibasho, ふたりの居場所) by Hazuki
5. **My Little Sister's Loved One** (Imouto-chan no Daisuki na Mono, 妹ちゃんの大好きなもの) by Izumi Kirifu
6. **Koma-chan and Sensei's Time** (Koma-chan to Sensei no Jikan, こまちゃんとせんせいのじかん) by kurimo.
7. **Failure** (Dame na Hito, だめなひと) by Masanaga
8. **A Dream of Spring on a Tatami Mat** (Ichi-jou Shunmu, 一畳春夢) by Sakasana

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.ja-ro: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

altTitles.ja: パーフェクトワールド

description.en:
Kawana Tsugumi works for an interior design company. She goes to a drinking party at a client's architectural office and happens to meet her first love. He's more handsome than ever and it isn't until he's leaving that she realizes something has changed: Ayukawa is in a wheelchair.  
  
[From MU]

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーJKクズハナちゃん

altTitles.pt-br: Garota Delinquente Do Ensino Médio KuzuHana-chan

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

title.en: Is a Mother in Her 30s Like Me Alright?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaamama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.ja: アラサーママの私でいいの？

altTitles.zh: 三十多岁当妈的我也可以吗？

altTitles.vi: Bà mẹ đơn thân ngoài 30 như chị liệu ổn chứ?

altTitles.ja-ro: Arasaa mama no Watashi de Ii no?

altTitles.en: I'm around 30 is it OK with me?

altTitles.ru: С такой матерью как я, которой за 30, всё ли будет хорошо?

description.en: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is… he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
description.ru: 20 летний студент университета, говорит 32-летней матери-одиночки, что она ему нравится . Дело в том... Что он не особенно стесняется того, почему она ему нравится.
description.uk:
20-річний студент зізнався у коханні своїй 32-річній сусідці матері-одиначці. Справа в тому... Що він зовсім не *соромиться* розказувати про те, чому закоханий у неї.

[Офіційно] прохання виразити свої думки та враження від манґи у [цьому опитуванні.](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform)
description.vi: Shiraishi Hanano là một người phụ nữ 32 tuổi. Một ngày nọ, cô nhận được lời tỏ tình từ người hàng xóm Yoshio-kun, một sinh viên đại học. Cậu ta khăng khăng muốn cưới cô ấy làm vợ, thậm chí không quan tâm cả việc cô ấy đã từng kết hôn hay có một đứa con gái
description.pt-br:
Uma mãe solteira de 32 anos ouve de seu vizinho, um estudante universitário de cerca de 20, que ele gosta dela. A coisa é… ele não é particularmente tímido sobre por que gosta dela.  
  
[Oficial] Por favor, responda [this survey](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf2Y999w7eCjYHgHquZcZ50TxXPcJeY1XjTsWxelzhSDEPsKw/viewform) para dar seus pensamentos e impressões!

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス

altTitles.en: Stray Dogs of the Literary Masters

description.en: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
description.ru: Нашего героя выгнали из детского дома. Стоя у реки, он думал о голодной смерти, но чудом умудрился спасти самоубийцу. Этот человек, оказалось, состоит в детективном агентстве. В агентстве со сверхъестественными способностями. И только им подвластно решение проблем, за которые боятся браться даже военные. Теперь жизнь нашего героя изменится кардинально. А как именно читайте далее.

altTitles.ja: 半人前の恋人

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

altTitles.ja: ウルトラマン

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Kazuo Umezu's "Ultraman" was serialized at the same time as the 1966 TV broadcast!　The fierce battles with popular monsters such as the Baltan and Mefilas aliens are fully recorded along with the color pages from the serialization and the chapter covers!

Kazuo Umezu's very famous manga adaptation of the first Ultraman series.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

description.en: You must take the fall with me.The abuse people suffer during their childhood will all burst out all at once when they grow up. Some people choose to vent their anger to the outside world, but some people will only keep it in and torture themselvesThis is quite literally the description from bilibili 😭 - Kora

Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.ja: 複雑な姉弟の４コマ

description.en:
"Big Sis!?"
"Kouta!?"


The two of them were enjoying an in-game romance (without knowing each other's identities). Upon seeing each other's faces at their long-awaited offline meetup... they were both shocked to see that their partner was in fact their own sibling!?

These are complicated feelings for sure... and rather hard to accept!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322302001578/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20068503/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
「姉ちゃん!?」
「康太!?」

＊

ゲーム内で恋愛を楽しんでいたふたり。
待ちに待ったオフ会で顔を合わせたら……相手はまさかの姉弟で!?
複雑なこの感情……なかなか飲み込むのは難しい！

ＳＮＳで話題のカオス展開ラブコメが、 描き下ろしを加えて待望の書籍化!!

altTitles.ja: 君に捧げる男前

description.en: "I'm going to tell you I love you every day!" A younger handsome guy confesses his love on their first meeting! An uneven love story between a good looking boy and a manly girl begins.

title.en: This Sweet Online Date Is a Disaster

altTitles.en: Sweet Online Dating Has Been Overturned?!

altTitles.vi: Tình yêu mạng ngọt ngào lật xe rồi!

altTitles.ja: ネット恋愛で神展開！？

description.en: I was helping my sister win the heart of the game's top-ranked player, but it turned out to be a total disaster! I was even ridiculed by that gaming master!!! I guess no one can defy Murphy's Law! Just as the game was loading... Ding! Notice: Your husband is now online!

title.en: Fall in Love With the Substitute

altTitles.en: The White Moonlight fell for his Stand-in?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Bai Yueguang Ta Ai Shang Tishenle?!

altTitles.en: Has He, the White Moonlight, Fallen For a Substitute?!

description.en:
Su Yichen is the kept substitute lover of the Big Boss, Gu Hanzhou, taking the place of the Boss' White Moonlight, Pei Suyue. Everyone thought that Su Yichen's love was selfless and humble, unaware that it was all due to his superb acting skills and that the Boss was merely just his ATM. 

In an unexpected turn of events, the White Moonlight returned to the country earlier than expected and even stayed at the Big Boss' house. 

The very first day he moved in, the White Moonlight said to the Substitute: "Susu, Leave Gu Hanzhou and come with me!"

*White Moonlight - A person you long for but cannot have; unforgettable first love

altTitles.ja: こまえーきイチャイチャ漫画
コンデ・コマ

description.en:
This manga tells the legacy of Mitsuyo Maeda a Brazilian naturalized as Otávio Maeda, who was a Japanese judōka (judo expert) and prizefighter in no holds barred competitions. He was also known as Count Combat or Conde Koma in Spanish and Portuguese, a nickname he picked up in Spain in 1908. Along with Antônio Soshihiro Satake (another naturalized Brazilian), he pioneered judo in Brazil, the United Kingdom, and other countries.  
  
Maeda was fundamental to the development of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu, including through his teaching of Carlos Gracie and others of the Gracie family. He was also a promoter of Japanese emigration to Brazil. Maeda won more than 2,000 professional fights in his career. His accomplishments led to him being called the "toughest man who ever lived" and being referred to as the father of Brazilian Jiu-jitsu.

title.en: I Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

altTitles.en: I Said I Turned off The Pain Perception Setting!
I'm Telling You, I Already Turned Off The Pain Perception Setting!

description.en:
**Pain Perception 0, Capture rate is 100!**

A virtual reality game with pain perception set to '0'.
I was the first to clear all endings, and started the final 100th playthrough... but something is off.

Suddenly, I have a strange disease with a terminal setting, and the capture target characters are starting to worry about me.

"I don't feel any pain, so should I pretend to be sick?"

Before I knew it, to the capture target characters, I became a noble hero enduring pain and sacrificing for world peace.

Since it has come to this, the concept for this playthrough is a terminally ill hero throwing herself for the world!

I must end it with a happy ending. This is my last playthrough in my life!

altTitles.ja: きみは, ニーナじゃない
きみは ニーナじゃない

description.en: The only solace for this young man, who has withdrawn into his own shell after a heartbreak, is watching his "idol" on stream. Then one day, he suddenly finds himself hiding from a girl who turns out to be his "idol"...? A life-changing romance between a heartbroken boy and a streamer begins!
description.pt-br: Aoba é um jovem que sofreu um trauma devido a um terrível término de relacionamento. Por conta disso, desenvolveu medo de interagir com outras pessoas, deixou seu emprego e passou a viver fazendo trabalhos temporários, tendo como única alegria assistir às transmissões de sua streamer favorita. Certo dia, ao ser abordado por uma garota que costumava ver em seu caminho de volta para casa, ele acaba concordando em morar com ela? Ele fica surpreso ao descobrir que ela era justamente sua streamer favorita... Assim, tem início um romance transformador entre um rapaz de coração partido e uma streamer!

description.en:
The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”

altTitles.en: Isshiki-san Wants to Know About Love.

altTitles.ja-ro: Koutetsu no Rinna wa XX Saretai.

altTitles.ja: 一式さんは恋を知りたい。
鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 一式小姐想要知曉戀愛。

altTitles.zh-ro: Gāngtiě zhí nǚ xiǎng bèi xx
Yīshì xiǎojiě xiǎng yào zhīxiǎo liàn'ài.
Gāngtiě de lín nà xiǎng bèi xx

description.en:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around… So, she makes a choice…?
description.ja:
堅物で真面目な警察官だと周りから尊敬されている一式警部は、最近どうも仕事がうまくいかないご様子。
その原因は一緒に仕事をしている探偵・六反田がいる時にばかり起こってしまう…。
とあることから悩みの原因が判明した彼女は、問題を解決すべく六反田探偵と擬似カップルとして付き合うことになったが…？
恋を知らない乙女が擬似カップルとしてお付き合いに大挑戦な、ラブコメディ！

※2話目まで旧タイトル「鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい」表記となります。
description.pt-br:
Uma donzela que não sabe o que é o amor, experimenta o namoro como um pseudo-casal!

A inspectora Rinna, que é respeitada por todos como uma agente policial trabalhadora e séria, parece estar a ter problemas com o seu trabalho ultimamente. A razão para isto é porque ela perde o foco. Isto só acontece quando Meishi, o detective com quem ela trabalha, está por perto. Então, ela faz uma escolha…?

description.en: Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

altTitles.ja: 地縛少年 花子くん
地缚少年花子君

altTitles.pt-br: Hanako-Kun e os mistérios do colégio Kamome

altTitles.es-la: Hanako-kun y los Misterios de la Academia Kamome

altTitles.th: ฮานาโกะคุง วิญญาณติดที่

description.en:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san… are you there?"  
At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom… but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san… is a boy!  
  
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Hanako si Arwah Penasaran** (2019)
- Korean release by 루트미디어 as **지박소년 하나코군** (2019)
- Polish release by Studio JG as **Hanako : duch ze szkolnej toalety**
- Turkish release by Gerekli Şeyler Yayıncılık as **Tuvalet Hayaleti Hanako-Kun** (2022)
description.id:
Ada rumor tentang tujuh misteri atau lebih dikenal dengan "Nana Fushigi" di Akademi Kamome. Salah satunya adalah “Hanako”, hantu yang menghuni toilet wanita bilik ketiga di lantai 3 gedung sekolah lama. Konon, dia akan mengabulkan apa pun harapan orang yang memanggilnya. Di sisi lain, Nene Yashiro, seorang siswi SMA, melibatkan dirinya dengan makhluk supernatural agar harapannya terkabul. Inilah kisah komedi yang menghangatkan hati tentang Hanako, si hantu toilet, dengan gadis penggemar misteri!

(Sumber: Sinopsis resmi)
description.it: Hanako, una sorta di spiritello noto come uno dei 7 misteri dell'Accademia Kamone, occupa il terzo bagno nei sanitari femminili al terzo piano, nel vecchio palazzo della scuola, e può avverare qualsiasi desiderio quando viene invocato. Un giorno come tanti, Nene Yashiro, una grande amante dell'occulto che sogna il grande amore, s'imbatte in Hanako ma viene colta dalla sorpresa quando scopre che Hanako è proprio un ragazzo! Nene diventa la sua assistente facendo così iniziare le loro avventure tra le varie leggende metropolitane che popolano la scuola.
description.ru:
«Ханако-сан, Ханако-сан… ты там?»  
В академии Камомэ, как и во многих других японских школах существуют «семь школьных тайн», одна из которых легенда о Ханако-сан. Говорят, что если в женском туалете на третьем этаже постучать в третью кабинку, появится Ханако-сан, которая исполнит любое твоё желание…  
Ясиро Нэнэ — обычная школьница, любящая жуткие истории, отправляется в женский туалет, чтобы призвать Ханако-сан и исполнить своё романтическое желание. Но, как оказалось, в академии Камомэ Ханако-сан — это… мальчик.
description.th: มีข่าวลือน่าพิศวงเกี่ยวกับสิ่งลี้ลับทั้งเจ็ดที่เล่าต่อกันมาในโรงเรียนคาโมเมะ ว่ากันว่าในห้องน้ำหญิงห้องที่สามชั้นที่สามของตึกเรียนเก่ามี "คุณฮานาโกะ" ที่จะช่วยให้คำขอร้องของผู้ที่เรียกตนออกมาสมหวังไม่ว่าจะเป็นเรื่องใดก็ตาม เนเนะ ยาชิโระ ผู้ที่มีความปรารถนาว่าอยากจะใจตรงกันกับคนที่ชอบ ก็ได้ลองเข้าไปในห้องน้ำหญิงแล้วลองเรียก "คุณฮานาโกะ คุณฮานาโกะ อยู่หรือเปล่าคะ" ตอนนั้นเองคุณฮานาโกะก็ได้ปรากฏตัวออกมาจริง ๆ ทว่า คุณฮานาโกะคนนั้นกลับเป็นเด็กผู้ชายซะงั้น!
description.es-la:
"Hanako, Hanako... ¿estás ahí?"
En la Academia Kamome, abundan los rumores sobre los Siete Misterios de la escuela, uno de los cuales es Hanako. Se dice que ocupa el tercer puesto del baño de niñas del tercer piso en el antiguo edificio de la escuela, Hanako concede cualquier deseo cuando es convocado. Nene Yashiro, una chica de escuela secundaria que adora el ocultismo que sueña con el romance, se aventura en este baño embrujado, pero el Hanako que conoce no es nada como ella se imaginaba. ¡Hanako de la academia Kamome en realidad es un niño!

title.en: My Stepsister Who is Perfect in Public, Shows Her True Colors at Home

altTitles.ja: 外面は最高なのに、家では本性むき出しの義姉

altTitles.ja-ro: Sotozura wa Saikou na no ni, Ie de wa Honsei Mukidashi no Gimai

altTitles.en: Even though the outside is the best, her sister-in-law has a bare nature at home

altTitles.es-la: Mi hermanastra que es perfecta en público, muestra su verdadera cara en casa.

description.en:
**Second English title is the one used on Amazon.** (I know it's not correct but thought I'd add it)

~ Heatmanga

altTitles.ja: 少年のアビス

description.en:
In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. He thought he would "just" keep on living like that.

Until he met her.

Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead?

It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

altTitles.th: คุณอันโจ หยอกนักเพราะรักนะ

description.de:
Seto ist ein total normaler und irgendwie langweiliger Schüler. Aus einem unerklärlichen Grund jedoch, lässt seine Mitschülerin Anjou ihn nicht in Ruhe! Der ernste Seto und die energische Anjou bilden ein kontrastreiches Duo, doch Anjou macht das nichts aus, da sie sehr viel Spaß hat, Seto zu necken. Andererseits hat Seto eine schwere Zeit mit Anjous Eskapaden. Wenn er doch nur wüsste, dass seine Reaktionen der Grund sind, dass Anjou weitermacht.  
  
Doch … ist ihr flirten wirklich nur gespielt …?
description.en:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?
description.fr: Seto est un lycéen ne souhaitant qu'une chose : passer sa scolarité sans être remarqué et être en paix. Malheureusement pour lui, il attire l'attention de la pire personne possible dans sa classe, Anjou la gal. A partir de ce jour, le quotidien de Seto va drastiquement changer grâce (ou à cause) de sa camarade, cherchant à s'amuser au dépend de notre héros.
description.ja: 真面目でクラスの中でも目立たない瀬戸くんには、なぜかいつもイケてるギャルの安城さんがいちいちエロく絡んでくる。いつもギリギリでドキドキする思春期ぴちぴちラブコメディ！
description.ru: Сето - серьёзный старшеклассник, который вел тихую школьную жизнь, пока не стал жертвой дразнилок гяру Андзё-сан.
description.pt-br:
Seto é um estudante completamente comum e um tanto chato. Mesmo assim, por alguma razão, sua nada correta colega de classe Gal Anjou simplesmente não o deixa em paz!

O Seto sério e a enérgica Anjou formam uma dupla um tanto interessante, mas Anjou não parece se importar, pois se diverte muito provocando-o. Por outro lado, Seto tem dificuldade em lidar com todas as suas travessuras intermináveis; mal ele percebe que suas reações humorísticas são precisamente o motivo pelo qual Anjou gosta de sua companhia.

Mas… quanto de seu flerte é meramente uma atuação?

altTitles.ja-ro: Kizokuka Sannan no Nariagari Life: Umarete Sugu ni Jingai Nintei Sareta Shounen wa Isekai wo Mankitsu Suru

altTitles.ja: 貴族家三男の成り上がりライフ: 生まれてすぐに人外認定された少年は異世界を満喫する

description.en:
After losing his life in an accident, an ordinary young man finds himself in the afterlife, where he meets the Creator God who rules over another world!?

Reborn by the God’s power as the third son of a noble family, named Alrain, he is showered with love by his family and grows up healthily. However, even after his reincarnation, numerous deities keep coming to see him one after another.

Favored and blessed abundantly by these gods, Alrain eventually realizes he possesses powers far beyond human capabilities. Wanting to live a low-key life, Alrain hides his abilities and enrolls in a magical academy, enjoying a fun school life in this new world. But trouble doesn’t leave him alone.

Assassins from dark guilds, foolish nobles plotting to overthrow the kingdom, and even demons defying the gods appear, throwing his life into chaos. In the face of such turmoil, he can no longer stay silent!

To resolve the kingdom-wide uproar, he unleashes his ‘god-class’ powers!

title.en: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.

altTitles.ja: 地元のいじめっ子達に仕返ししようとしたら、別の戦いが始まった。

altTitles.zh: 本想报复以前欺负我的孩子王，另一场战斗却开始了。

altTitles.en: When Trying to Get Back at the Hometown Bullies, Another Battle Began.

description.en:
Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games.

Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them.

As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...!

But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected....
description.vi: Oneshot chính thức được làm thành series của tác giả Matsumoto Kengo. Sau nhiều năm rời xa quê hương, Kotaro đã quay về để báo thù 3 kẻ bắt nạt từng khiến cậu khổ sở hồi cấp 1. Thế nhưng khi gặp lại 3 kẻ bắt nạt, những gì chờ đợt cậu lại vượt xa những gì cậu tưởng tượng...

altTitles.ja: 咲ちゃんは淫魔の子（合掌）

description.en:
Saki-chan, a succubus, has fallen in love with Rokuhara, a son of a temple, of all people. She tries her best to talk to him, but her succubus blood runs wild and she always ends up tempting him. "I wish I could say I love you honestly!"

This is a story about a pure and simple love of a succubus who can't be honest.
description.ja: 「えっちだってだいじょうぶっ教!?」がSNSで大反響！ 待望の第1巻！ 淫魔の咲ちゃんが恋した相手は、よりにもよってお寺の息子の六原くん。頑張って話しかけようとしても淫魔の血が暴走して、ついつい誘惑してしまい――。「素直に好きと言えたらいいのに！」ぽんこつ可愛い淫魔のピュアピュアHな恋の行方は……!? 残念サキュバス×カタブツお寺男子の昇天上等、全力ラブコメ！

altTitles.ja: FAIRY TAIL [フェアリーテイル]

description.en:
Celestial wizard Lucy wants to join the Fairy Tail, a guild for the most powerful wizards. But instead, her ambitions land her in the clutches of a gang of unsavory pirates led by a devious magician. Her only hope is Natsu, a strange boy she happens to meet on her travels. Natsu's not your typical hero - but he just might be Lucy's best hope.
  
Won the 33th Kodansha Manga Award for Best Shounen Manga.  
Won the Society for the Promotion of Japanese Animation's Industry Award for Best Comedy Manga.
description.ru: Заклинательница духов - Люси хочет вступить в Фейри Тейл, Гильдия для самых могущественных волшебников. Но вместо этого амбиции толкнули девушку прямо в лапы банды пиратов во главе с коварным магом. Ее единственная надежда Нацу, странный мальчик, которого она случайно встречает в своих путешествиях. Нацу не ваш типичный герой - но он может быть лучшей надеждой для Люси.
description.pt-br: Do mesmo criador de Rave Master, Fairy Tail conta a história de Natsu Dragneel e seus amigos, todos magos pertencentes à guilda Fairy Tail, mundialmente conhecida por desrespeitar regras e causar destruição. Com o decorrer da trama, acompanhamos a busca de Natsu por seu pai adotivo, o dragão Igneel.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: エロティック×アナボリック

description.en:
Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class.   
He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit!  
Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!

altTitles.ja: しかのこのこのここしたんたん

description.en:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?
  
Fun Fact :  
-Author is the illustrator for Vtuber [天音かなた](https://m.youtube.com/channel/UCZlDXzGoo7d44bwdNObFacg)   
-Because of that, Physical copies on Amazon store soldout on the 1st day

title.en: Playboy Repents and is Reborn into a Complicated Relationship with Five People

altTitles.zh: 海王从良后陷入了五等分修罗场

altTitles.en: The Playboy Has Reformed After Falling Into Five Equal Love Complex

altTitles.id: Si Playboy yang Bereinkarnasi Terjebak dengan Lima Haremnya

altTitles.zh-ro: Hǎiwáng Cóngliáng Hòu Xiànrùle Wǔ Děng Fēn Xiūluō Chǎng

description.en: The playboy is reborn at a crucial moment in '1 Day with 4 Suitors.' To survive, he sends them all breakup letters and runs away. Unexpectedly, his exes all rush to seduce him, and the guy he sought shelter with seems to have increasingly intense eyes each day! I've fallen into a complicated situationship with too many people. How do I deal with having too many husbands?

title.en: The Romcom Where the Childhood Friend Won't Lose!

altTitles.ja: Osananajimi ga Zettai ni Makenai Love Comedy
幼なじみが絶対に負けないラブコメ

description.en:
My childhood friend Shida Kuroha seems to have feelings for me. She lives next door, and is small and cute. With an outgoing character, she’s the caring Onee-san type, this being one of her greatest strengths.  
  
…But, I already have my first love, the beautiful idol of our school, and the award-winning author high school girl, Kachi Shirokusa! Thinking about it rationally, I should have no chances with her, but, while walking home from school, she only talks to me, with a smile even! I might actually have a chance, don’t you think?!  
  
Or so I thought, but then I heard that Shirokusa already has a boyfriend, and my life took a turn for the worse. I want to die. Why is it not me?! Even though she was my first love…As I was drowning in despair and depression, Kuroha whispered.  
  
—If it’s that tough for you, then how about we get revenge? The best revenge ever, that is~
description.es-la: Mi amiga de la infancia, Shida Kuroha, parece sentir algo por mí. Ella vive al lado, y es pequeña y linda. Con un carácter extrovertido, ella es del tipo de Onee-san, este es uno de sus mayores puntos fuertes. … ¡Pero ya tengo mi primer amor, la bella idol de nuestra escuela y la galardonada autora de secundaria, Kachi Shirokusa! Pensando en ello racionalmente, no debería tener posibilidades con ella, pero mientras caminaba a casa desde la escuela, ¡ella me habla, incluso con una sonrisa! De hecho, podría tener una oportunidad, ¿no crees? O eso pensé, pero luego escuché que Shirokusa ya tiene novio, y mi vida empeoró. Quiero morirme. ¿Por qué no soy yo? Aunque ella fue mi primer amor ... Mientras me ahogaba en la desesperación y la depresión, Kuroha susurró. "Si es tan difícil para ti, ¿qué tal si nos vengamos? La mejor venganza de la historia, eso es ~

title.en: Forced to Be an Invincible Saintess

altTitles.zh-ro: Bèi Pò Chéngwéi Kāi Guà De Wúdí Shèng Nǚ

altTitles.zh: 被迫成为开挂的无敌圣女

description.en: The true identity of the saint that is worshipped by all the people in the kingdom is actually an average boy? With the beautiful priest, the big breasted knight, and the loli doctor at the side, the road of a saintess is really difficult...

title.en: The Cold Beauty At School Became My Pet Cat

altTitles.ja-ro: Chiteki de Cool na Kouhai Bijo, Ore no Kai Neko ni naru

altTitles.ja: 知的でクールな後輩美女、俺の飼い猫になる

altTitles.zh: 知性冰山美人学妹成了我的猫

description.en: The real identity of my beautiful kouhai who acts cold most of the time but gets shy when she wears a pair of cat ears is..?
description.es-la: ¿La verdadera identidad de mi hermosa kouhai que actúa con frialdad la mayor parte del tiempo pero se vuelve tímida cuando usa un par de orejas de gato es…?
description.pt-br: A verdadeira identidade da minha linda kouhai que age com frieza a maior parte do tempo, mas fica tímida quando usa um par de orelhas de gato é..?

title.en: My Stepmom's Daughter Is My Ex

altTitles.es-la: La hija de mi madrastra es mi ex-novia.

altTitles.ru: Дочь моей мачехи - моя бывшая девушка

altTitles.ja: 継母の連れ子が元カノだった

altTitles.ja-ro: Mamahaha no Tsurego ga Moto Kanodatta

altTitles.pt-br: A Filha da minha Madrasta era minha ex-Namorada.

altTitles.en: My Stepmom's Daughter was My EX-Girlfriend

description.en:
A certain boy and girl in middle school became lovers, flirted with each other, disagreed on trivial things, became more frequently irritated with each other rather than excited… and ended up breaking up on graduation.  
  
And so, the two of them, Irido Mizuto and Ayai Yume, wound up meeting each other in the most unexpected fashion.  
  
“Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder brother.” “Isn’t it obvious that I’m the elder sister.”  
  
The children of the partner of their parent’s remarriage was their ex-lover!?  
  
The former couple, mindful of their parent’s feelings, decided on a ‘sibling rule’ where the one takes conscious of the other as the opposite sex loses, but—  
  
When they encounter each other in the bathroom, commute to and from school together… along with the memories of the past and living under the same roof, just how do they disregard each other!?  

---

- [Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsurekano)
- [Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/my-stepmom-s-daughter-is-my-ex) - English translation at J-Novel Club.
description.ja: まだお互いに、好き同士。そんな元カップルが――親の再婚できょうだいに!?　第3回カクヨムWeb小説コンテスト大賞受賞の人気ノベルをコミカライズ！ 一つ屋根の下で繰り広げられる、ひたすらに甘くて焦れったい悶絶ラブコメ！
description.ru:
Эта история о парне и девушке, которые влюбились друг в друга ещё в средней школе. Тем не менее, со временем их любовь превратилась во взаимное раздражение, что привело к их расставанию после окончания школы…  
Но кто бы мог подумать, что судьбы Иридо Мизуто и Айя Юмэ пересекутся вновь при самых неожиданных для них обстоятельствах… Теперь они вынуждены жить под одной крышей, изображая для своих родителей сводного брата и сестру.   
Но оставаясь наедине и предаваясь воспоминаниям о прошлом… Смогут ли они сдержаться и не поддаться своему соблазну?!

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanchigai no Atelier Meister: Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga, Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 勘違いの工房主(アトリエマイスター)

description.en:
Kuruto gets kicked out of the hero's party for being too useless in combat. However unknown to him, he's SSS Rank in skills like cooking, building, magic tool crafting, etc. 
  
WN Raw: <https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/292207951/264201950>

altTitles.ja: バトルスタディーズ

description.en:
You can’t win through only with “friendship” and “youth”. We stake our lives to get to Koshien!!  
  
Kanou Shoutarou entered an official baseball club at one of the best powerhouse baseball schools in the country - DL Gakuen. However the discipline in the club, he admired so much, was beyond all imagination!  
  
From Nakibokuro - the former member of PL Gakuen’s baseball club who played at the Koshien as the regular!

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.  
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!  

- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!
